channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Oregon Health Authority says a
item.description: Oregon Health Authority says alcohol-related deaths jump 30% in three years; Oregon Recovers urges governor, lawmakers take 'swift, definitive action,' including raising alcohol taxes and alcohol, cannabis prices.

item.title: A 21-year-old Bend man was ser
item.description: A 21-year-old Bend man was seriously injured this evening in the rollover crash of his motorcycle on the Bend Parkway, but police say he is expected to survive.

item.title: First January 6 rioter to brea
item.description: First January 6 rioter to breach US Capitol is sentenced to more than 4 years in prison.
